root.name: Speed Punks
root.description: Speed Punks (Speed Freaks in Europe) is a Mario Kart style racer developed by Funcom Dublin. It featured six racers which were either light, medium or heavy classed, with a further two unlockable characters. Weight class effected top speed, acceleration and collision recovery. Weapons included missiles, bombs, slime, boost, stealth, tire pop and shock wave. Games modes were the usual array of single player, tournament, time attack and four player split screen, spread over twelve levels
